【考法 1】 adj. 精练的，简洁的： precisely meaningful; forceful and brief
【例】 The professor gave a pithy introduction to this course. 教授就这门课程做了简短的介绍。
【近】 apothegmatic, brief, capsule, compact, compendious, concise, laconic, succinct, telegraphic, terse
【反】 circuitous, circumlocutory, diffuse, rambling, prolix, verbose, windy, wordy 冗长累赘的
【派】 pithiness n. 简洁，犀利

【记】 pith 精髓
The chain is not stronger than its weakest link. 链条的坚固取决于其最弱一环。
